snippet: Gunmen attacked a checkpoint and a police patrol on Friday in eastern Yemen, killing 17 soldiers, military and security officials said.
abstract: Gunmen attack a checkpoint and police patrol in eastern Yemen, killing 17 soldiers.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen attacked a checkpoint and a police patrol on Friday in eastern Yemen, killing 17 soldiers, military and security officials said.

headline.main: 17 Soldiers Killed in Ambushes in Yemen
